titleStmt.title: A vindication of the conforming clergy from the unjust aspersions of heresie, &c. in answer to some part of Mr. Jenkyn's funeral sermon upon Dr. Seaman : with short reflexions on some passages in a sermon preached by Mr. J.S. upon 2 Cor. 5:20 : in a letter to a friend.
titleStmt.author: Grove, Robert, 1634-1696.

notesStmt.note: Written by Robert Grove. Cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
